import Rhino.Geometry as rg

# Define the start point of the bridge at the origin
start_point = rg.Point3d(0, 0, 0)

# Define the end point of the bridge, assuming a length of 100 units along the X-axis
end_point = rg.Point3d(100, 0, 0)

# Assign both points to the output variable 'a' as a list
a = [start_point, end_point]
